The dress itself is made out of thick material it is not thin nor it is see through. It does run true to size and has buttons where the straps go, however be careful not pulling too much because they do tend to come off easily. Other than that great dress that is just as described
Super cute dress. Comfortable, lightweight, and fits perfectly. Fabric is moderate quality.. no real complaints but its not super high quality.

I did like the skirt part of this dress, it was good for twirling if that’s a goal for you! But the bodice was not it. First of all, the buttons at the straps immediately popped off. The bodice has no structure so it couldn’t be worn strapless. I didn’t really notice it in the pictures, but look carefully at the neck/bustline— it’s just an amorphous shape. Really not cute.
It's a cute dress, looks good on the person I got it for. The only issue I've found is the buttons fall off
I was worried that this might be a little too goth, but honestly it feels like it could be a nice semi formal dress for any occasion :) true to size!
Very flattering dress, the material is silky and soft, and it was very comfortable.
Gorgeous and comfy! My daughter layered this with another dress/jacket from this seller and it looked beautiful! It is true to size, well-made, and super comfortable.

评论概述: Beautiful affordable dress, but beware the buttons!
评论详情: This dress was cute and lightweight - the perfect dark vibe I was looking for as an outfit base since I was seeing the Cure. I built a whole outfit around it and it was fabulous! That being said, I was glad I brought a layer along with me because the buttons of the shoulder straps (which hold the dress up) magically disappeared off the dress during the concert and I wasn't doing anything strenuous to cause major wear and tear (like dancing or anything) since it was a squished, seated venue. Thankfully the fit was pretty good on me, but if it had been looser, the dress might have fallen down! 😅 Now I need to purchase buttons to sew in. Not fantastic for a first wear. That one small issue aside, it is cool that the straps have multiple button holes so you can adjust the straps' lengths and the lighter weight of the fabric was good for someone who runs warm like me. For the price point, it seems fair, but beware those buttons popping off so you don't have any wardrobe malfunctions!

I ordered a large (my normal size is 10-12) and it fits GREAT!!  straps are adjustable so you can adjust the fit of the bodice and how much or little cleavage you want.  Super stoked to wear it to the party tonight!!

This dress was better than I expected.  Fabric was good and not at all see through.  I ordered one size bigger than I wear expecting it to run small and it fit but was a little big.  I wish I had ordered my actual size.  Dress has good Stretch to it in the waist area as well.

When I saw this dress. I knew I had to have it! My 25th birthday is coming up and I wanted something new and more my style to wear on the day. It fits nicely and secure. Can't wait to show off on my day.
flattering design comfortable fit

评论概述: I am in love with this dress.
评论详情: It is super cute and definitely fits my alternative/gothic style. It was tight in the shoulder, but was easily adjusted with the shoulder buttons. The buckles on the front are super cute and the waist is slimming. I am 5’9-1/2 165 with a D cup and the medium is perfect. The front sits a couple of inches above my knee, and the back falls mid calf. The material and stitching is thick in the bust and I wear it without a bra.

Like most of this brands clothing this is a nice quality item. The fabric is heavier than I expect. The fit is perfect for my size and weight. With this brand I don't have to worry about sizing up as everything usually fits.
Wonderful dress just a little too large for me
First time I wore it one of the back buttons popped off, I still wore it in an altered look but it was a bummer.  I like it regardless and it’s really cute

评论概述: Beautiful dress, but it runs a little large.
评论详情: This Scarlet Darkness Women's Gothic Steampunk Ruffle Hi-Low Hem Vintage Dress is absolutely gorgeous. I ordered it for my 12-year-old daughter who is 5.7, has a 27-inch waist, and 37-inch hips.  She usually wears a Women's size small, which is also the size in which I ordered this dress. This dress may be running a tad large. I would definitely not size up. Because my daughter had a lot of extra room in the bust area, this dress could work for bustier ladies. This dress's fabric is soft and I did not see any issues with the stitching. We couldn't use the belts to tighten the dress, which was something I had hoped for. Although I think this dress looks great with a petticoat underneath, my daughter preferred it without. I've uploaded photos of both looks so people can see what the differences are.
I love this dress it is super cute

It’s a cute dress in theory but it did not work on me. Would have if the corset buckles were real and could tighten the waist. But they’re not and it’s too big in the waist on me. Disappointed. I’m 5’6, 29 waist, 36C, 38 hips, size 6 and I ordered the small. It fit everywhere else great and would have been cute to wear. Very unfortunate.
My daughter loves steampunk and I knew she would just adore this cool dress.  I was right! - it looks amazing on and she absolutely loves it!!

So, my daughter is always looking for clothes that are a little different or out of the box. She likes to try out new things and looks. I love that about her. She never cares what other people think of her style. She got this gothic steam punk black dress and she wore it to her high school homecoming and she looked amazing. She got lots of compliments on it as well. It fit her perfectly. We got a large and it was perfect. It zipped up and had adjustable straps with 3 buttons and 2 leather belts threw the middle. The dress is made of 95% polyester and 5% spandex. The price is great and it comes in 3 colors, she got the black.

The Scarlet Darkness Womens Gothic Steampunk Dress will be so great for cosplay, the Renaissance Festival, or Halloween.  This dress is one piece and it pulls over the head.The fabric feels like polyester.  One thing I noticed about this dress (I bought it for my daughter) is that the buckles on the belts are fake.  You really have no way of resizing or shaping this dress.  You have to get the size right, or it has to fit you exactly.The dress looks better from a distance; once you get close, you can see that it's a kind of inexpensive fabric.  However, for any costume, it's pretty well done, and it's not too expensive.  Highly recommended.

I feel so beautiful in this dress! The neckline and waistline are flattering and has a bit of stretch that makes it so comfortable. The high low hem is cute and would look amazing with some textured fishnets. The details on the dress like ruffles and belts really make this dress special.

评论概述: Scarlet Darkness Womens Gothic Steampunk Pirate Dress Ruffle Hi-Low Hem Vintage Dresses Review
评论详情: The dress came quickly and was packed ok. The dress is light yet hangs perfectly. It fits well, making for a slimming look. Being able to adjust the straps is a plus.  My only complaint is that the dress does not come with pockets. I would purchase another dress if pockets were added to the Pirate Dress.

I am 215 lbs, 5’7” (wearing 4” heels) 37” waist, 41” bust/C cup, 46” hip. Pictured is size XL.  I always order XL in Scarlet Darkness brand as the 2XL is always too big. This fits my body appropriately around all parts of my body EXCEPT the bust. The shoulder straps have the nice option of being adjustable, so if I wear them at the smallest setting (pictured) it’s not as obvious that I don’t fill the top out. However there is still some puckering that happens near/below the armpit and the top buckle sits on the bottom of my bust line. So, saying that if you have a larger bust this dress might work out well for you. I really like the high-low feature of the skirt because I know for certain it’s always covering my big butt.  The fabric is the same type of fabric that SD usually uses. It’s thin costume-y fabric, but after wearing this twice now it’s actually really comfortable in Florida. It probably needs a dramatic steam, but I’ve been a bit busy getting ready for the fall semester.  My mom said the buckles look especially cheap, the metal doesn’t even look like metal. The dress over all is very comfortable and probably reasonable for the price point since it’s under $40.

Love the fit and style. Nicely made and appears to be a nice quality fabric. The hubby says it looks great. It compliments me well. But given the style, it should compliment a variety of body types. It's very sexy and fashionable. Can't wait to wear it out!
Sent a different dress two sizes too small not as described.

My wife is overjoyed with this dress. When shopping on Amazon, she often has to order clothing that are about 2 sizes too big, because the sizes do run small, but not with this dress…it’s a little roomy, but definitely beautiful. One can wear this as a cute and original sundress. The material is lightweight, cotton I assume…I could not see the tag. The straps are cool. They have button adjustments. There are little belt straps in the front that creates a smaller waist and style and it is trimmed with a light ruffle. My wife loves the comfort of this dress. It also makes a cute everyday dress, casual or dressy but also a unique Halloween costume. A lady could use this in a variety of ways, a pirate, witch, saloon girl…so many varieties to choose from!
Fit good, stretch back. Belts are just decorative.  Higher in front than back as described.  Would recommend

评论概述: Will need alterations if you’re thin
评论详情: I wanted to love this. The chest portion and waist are roughly the same size and if your waist is smaller than 32 inches you’ll likely need to take it in. The length was nice and the fabric washes, dries, and steams well.  I’m 5 foot 2, 35/27/38 and it fit everywhere except the waist, which frankly made it look ridiculous.
I got this for my Gothic Witch loving friend and she absolutely loved it. Material is soft, color is nice, and it fit as expected.

This dress is cute but it just fits really weird. I usually wear an xl, so online I always get an xxl. This dress was big enough that I didn't need to use the zipper to get it on or off. On the hand, the bust area just didn't sit right on me.  Also, the fabric is quite thin.

This is a super cute and quality witchy , Wench style dress.  Perfect for midevil or steampunk vibes.  It is constructed very well , but I wish there was more options for adjusting (such as the 2 belts around the waist area - which are more just for design than any sort of waist synching.)  the material is very comfortable and breezy, it looks beautiful.  I had to adjust the straps to the last button loops and still don't exactly get the cleavage I would like from this style of dress  . I love that the front is slightly shorter than the back, it gives you a bit more leg and really adds a nice silhouette to the look.  I think because of the stretchy back area you can go with the lower sizing that you would normally pick (if you usually fluctuate between a M/L get M. S/M get a S.)
